course_title: Advanced Management of Geriatric Skin, Continence and Functional Reserve
class_notes: Online asynchronous with classroom intensives dates: 9/27 at 4-6:50p, 11/8 at 4-6:50p.
course_description: Students will use knowledge and skills to effectively assess and holistically manage care related to the older adult experiencing skin, continence, and mobility issues. Multiple approaches will be explored to preserve physiological functions, maximize skin protection, and promote healing.
prerequisites: NRSG 528 and NRSG 554 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 4286, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Murphree/Wright, Status: Open
